title: The Perfect Clone 3
description: Just when life inside the compound was returning to normal, the Avery-Greggario struggle resurfaces, only this time, Laura’s son is the ultimate prize.Everyone assumes Aric is cloned from Cliff’s DNA, and Laura isn’t about to tell them any differently. The deception keeps her secret hidden.When a new Avery shows up with guns blazing and demands that Aric be handed over, Josh is forced to dig into Laura’s past and discover the truth behind Aric’s origins in order to save the child he loves as his own.Can Josh face his own personal demons and accept the truth? Or will the lives of everyone he loves be destroyed by the skeletons in Laura’s closet?
author: M.L. Stephens
